common.title: Luravie | Your Confidence Starts Within
common.description: Premium intimate essentials designed for comfort and confidence.
common.taxesNotice: Taxes and shipping calculated at checkout. Discreet packaging included.

trust.title: Built on Trust & Privacy
trust.discreetDesc: Shipped in plain, unmarked boxes for your absolute privacy.
trust.codDesc: Exclusively COD for your convenience. Pay only at your doorstep.
trust.inspectDesc: Inspect your items before making the payment for total peace of mind.
trust.fastDesc: Reliable delivery to your home within 2-4 business days.

home.heroSubtitle: Premium intimate essentials designed for the modern woman who values comfort, elegance, and discretion.
home.sectionSubtitle: Quality fabric, perfect fit, and discreet style. Designed to make you feel your best every single day.

shop.subtitle: Premium comfort for your daily life.

about.title: Confidence Starts Within
about.subtitle: Luravie was born from a simple belief: that every woman deserves to feel confident, elegant, and comfortable in her most intimate layers.
about.modernWoman: Modern Essentials for the Modern Woman
about.qualityText: We source only the finest fabrics that feel like a second skin. Our products are designed to withstand the test of time and repeated washing.
about.confText: Our cuts are meticulously tested on real bodies to ensure they provide the perfect balance of support and freedom.
about.aestheticText: Beauty lies in the details. From our soft color palette to our minimal stitching, every element is chosen with care.

contact.title: We're Here to Help
contact.subtitle: Have a question about our sizes, materials, or your order? Our dedicated team is ready to assist you.
contact.onlineOnlyText: Luravie operates exclusively online to provide you with the best prices and discreet direct-to-door delivery. We do not have a physical showroom, but we offer a flexible return-at-delivery policy via our courier.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.placeholderMessage: How can we help you today?
contact.successMessage: Message sent! We will get back to you soon.

checkout.emptySubtitle: Add some essentials to your bag before checking out.
checkout.codNotice: Luravie currently exclusively accepts Cash on Delivery. This allows you to inspect the quality and fit before completing your purchase at your doorstep.
checkout.inspectNotice: Pay only when you receive and inspect your items

errors.name: Full name is required
errors.invalidPhone: Enter a valid Egyptian mobile number (e.g. 01012345678)

success.title: Thank you for your order!
success.subtitle: Your order has been received and is currently being processed. You will receive a confirmation call shortly.

policyPage.title: Shipping & Privacy Policy
policyPage.intro: At Luravie, we understand that purchasing lingerie requires trust, comfort, and complete privacy. That’s why we’ve designed a shipping experience that protects your privacy from checkout to delivery.

items.item2: Inspection before payment available for your peace of mind

items.item1: All orders are packed in secure, discreet packaging
items.item2: No product names or content indicators on the package
items.item3: No details that may cause discomfort or embarrassment
items.item4: Delivered in a neutral, safe package ensuring 100% privacy

outro.text: We know many customers hesitate to buy lingerie online due to privacy concerns. That’s why we guarantee a safe, discreet, and worry-free shopping experience.
outro.tagline: ✨ Luravie – Shop with confidence. Your privacy is protected.

refundPage.title: Refund & Return Policy
refundPage.intro: For the safety and hygiene of our customers, we follow a strict return policy for intimate apparel/lingerie. We prioritize your health and confidence above all else.

inspection.title: Inspection Upon Delivery
inspection.text: We offer a 'Try Before You Buy' service. You are encouraged to open the package and inspect the materials, quality, and size while the courier waits (5-10 minutes). If you are not satisfied for any reason, you can return them instantly with the courier without paying anything.

noReturn.title: No Returns After Delivery
noReturn.text: Once you have accepted the package and the courier has left, we cannot accept returns or exchanges. This strict policy ensures that every item you receive from Luravie is 100% new, unworn, and untouched by previous customers.

defects.title: Manufacturing Defects
defects.text: In the rare case of a manufacturing defect discovered after delivery, please contact our support team within 24 hours of receiving your order, and we will arrange a replacement immediately.

outro.text: This policy guarantees that every piece you buy from us is fresh and hygienic.

shippingPage.title: Shipping Policy
shippingPage.intro: We provide fast, reliable, and invisible shipping. Our delivery network covers all of Egypt with optimized routes for the fastest possible service.

timelines.title: Delivery Timelines
timelines.text: We work hard to get your order to you as quickly as possible:

cost.title: Shipping Costs
cost.text: Shipping fees are calculated at checkout based on your city. We frequently offer free shipping promotions on orders over specific amounts.

packaging.title: Discreet Packaging
packaging.text: Your privacy is paramount. All orders are shipped in opaque, unmarked bags or boxes. The shipping label only contains your name, address, and 'Clothing' as the category, with no mention of brand names or specific product details.

outro.text: You will receive a tracking number and a confirmation call before delivery.
